headline: Art & Sole
excerpt: What your feet should be wearing when they kick up their heels.
content:
A Sleek Shoe Shuffle.

Art And Sole—Marcus One, an Asymmetrical Open-Toed Pump, In Pink Kidskin With Snakeskin Inlays; $145 At Leon's In Austin, Dallas, Houston, San Antonio, Tyler, Victoria, And Waco. ■ In the Garden—Jez Mid-Heel Shoe By Charles Jourdan, With Strap Across Instep, In Navy, Sand, Light Pink, Mauve, Or Light Gray Leather; $165 At Charles Jourdan, Dallas. (Urn From Rose Driver Antiques; Wall Treatment By Joseph Melacon.) ■ Photography By Geof Kern. Styling And Selection By Jan Keeton. Assistant Stylist Carolyn Van De Kamer.

In the Garden

Shoes Are Objects Of Study

Shoes Are Objects Of Study —Rilsa, an Evening Pump By Yves St. Laurent, In Bronze Or Pewter Lame Kidskin Or In Black Satin, With Matching Taffeta Bow; $165 At Woolf Brothers And Marie Leavell, Dallas. Yves St. Laurent Leather Pump Covered In Gray Silk, Also In Olive, White, Or Red; $98 At St. Vicina, Dallas. (Medical Chart From Uncommon Market; Globe From American Pro Map, Flag And Globe Company In Dallas, Houston, Austin, And San Antonio; Shirt And Cuff Links From Flaunt; Bow Tie From Ahab Bowen; Skull And Cobra Books From Richland Community College; Monkey From Animal Trackers; Eyeglasses From Oak Lawn Optical.) ■ Italian Theme-El Vaquero, a Green Textured Pump With Multicolored Woven Pattern, Made In Italy; $250 Exclusively At Serena d'italia, Dallas.

Italian Theme

Budding Companions

Budding Companions-High-Throated Classic Pump By Shoe Biz In Jadegreen, Bright Yellow, Or Fuchsia Kidskin, And In Black Patent Leather; $150 At Lou Lattimore, Dallas. (Millinery From Kayla Comstock. Makeup By Mia.) ■ Still Life-High-Heel Shoe With Hand-Painted Snakeskin Design And Hand-Piped Finish; $298 Exclusively At St. Vicina, Dallas. (Omniped From Uncommon Market; Table From Rose Driver Antiques.)

Still Life
